text: hananim-egeseo gyesibad-eun ideul on geudaeege gyesidoen geos-eulo gippeo ham-ila geuleona geugeos-eul bulsinhaneun muliga issnani illeo galodoe naega hananim-eul gyeongbaehadoe eotteon geosdo geu bunkke biyuhaji malla myeonglyeong-eul bad-ass euni naega baegseong-eul geubunkkelo indo hamyeo naneun geubunkkelo gwiuihanola
